QuestData.Title: Entangling Web
QuestData.Description:
It would seem we have a means of luring Mor'Bitan to us. But what good is a web if the prey can run free?
For these rituals to work, the liches require a magical conduit. They draw runes with finely ground maldracite to channel anima.
I have no doubt Mor'Bitan's necromancers have ground maldracite in the area. If we gather enough, we can draw a rune of binding to trap our target.
Work with haste, $p.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Maldracite Dust to Baroness Vashj at the ritual site.
QuestData.RewardText: He will not escape this time.
